item.description:
DAY/TIME: Wednesday, July 29, 3 p.m. to ????? I'll be there until around dinnertime (I have a dinner date). NOTE: I have an appointment at 1:30, so can't be at the Studio until 3, but if another Studio member can be there earlier, we'll move the start time back to earlier in the day.

AGENDA: No scheduled activities. Arrive and leave when you want. Work on your own projects at your own pace.

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom; access to Wi-Fi if you need to use your computer while you're there.

COST: $5, regardless of how long you stay. If people would like dinner, we can go out or get take-out (so bring a little extra cash for that, if you're interested).

WHO MAY ATTEND:Any member of the NE ATC+ or Altered Art/Assemblage Meetups.

WHAT TO BRING: Your own materials and projects to work on (just as you do for the regular Meetup; if you're a newbie, see "What to Bring to a Meetup" in the Files section.) A few basic supplies--scissors, glue, tape, etc. -- are available for loan.

HOW TO SIGN UP: You must RSVP "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function so we know who's coming and how many to expect. If your plans change, PLEASE switch your RSVP to “no” ASAP. Please RSVP even if you're a Studio member who's planning to be there anyway.

CANCELLATIONS: If you must cancel after the Open Studio has started -- PLEASE e-mail the Open Studio host. If we need to cancel for any reason (highly unlikely, but it could happen) we'll post a message here AND e-mail anyone who's signed up. For your own protection, we suggest checking your e-mail just before you leave the house.

TRANSPORTATION/DIRECTIONS: Sorry, we cannot provide or arrange transportation of any kind. If interested in sharing a ride, you may post a notice on the Message Board to see if anyone can help out. Thanks.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Open Studio at ArtStudio 360 in Holliston
